programme.title: Vachement Normand !
programme.desc:
Travelling salespeople in Calvados
In Calvados, Vincent meets some traders with a difference, who drive around the region inviting the population to buy their local and extraordinary products.
Presenter: Vincent Chatelain

programme.title: C Jamy
programme.desc:
Mont Blanc: the secrets of Europe's highest summit
Mont Blanc, towering to over 4,800 metres above sea-level, remained unclimbed until 1786, date of its first ascent. Who were the first to reach its peak? Is it French or Italian? Can its famous glacier, the Mer de Glace, be saved? Join us on the roof of Europe...
Presented by: Jamy Gourmaud.

programme.title: Le bonheur de vous plaire
programme.desc: To mark the 400th anniversary of Molière's birth, actors adopt the character of Tartuffe, a multifaceted, greedy and mischievous crook. Based on a single scene from Moliere's famous work, they question his sense of comedy. A behind the scenes immersion in "Vous toussez fort, Madame!", the play by Matthias Urban. Directed by: Géraldine Rod (Switzerland, 2022)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Electricity in every shape and form During an afternoon at the French Museum of Scientific History, Maha Zein, cultural interpreter, invites us to discover the mysteries of electricity through its history.

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.sub-title: Vrai ou faux : le vrai et le faux dans la science-fiction
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Whales
Rocky and Lily are heading off on a fabulous journey beneath the ocean waves, to meet the amazing blue whales and learn more about this protected species.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: L'odyssée Pacifique
programme.desc:
The Marquesas, Fiji, Bora Bora, Tahiti... Hopping from ship to ship, globetrotter and filmmaker Guillaume Beaudoin meets dedicated and inspiring people who are innovating to protect the balance and beauty of the environment around them. At each stop, he has the same realization: collective action begins with individual effort.

Directed by: Guillaume Beaudoin (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Secrets d'histoire
programme.desc:
Ragnar, the Viking who terrorised Paris
From the 9th to the 11th century, a wave of unprecedented violence hit Europe. The Vikings pillaged the kingdoms they crossed. Who were these Scandinavian warriors? It was in Norway, on the banks of the Naeroyfjord fjord, that it all began with the most notorious of their leaders: Ragnar Lodbrok.
Presenter: Stéphane Bern.

programme.title: Quelque part quelqu'un
programme.desc:
Paris, 1972. In the midst of the property boom, Raphaëlle, architect, works on renovating old properties and building new blocks of flats in the city. Vincent, financial journalist, is desperately trying to write a book. They attempt to build a relationship but Vincent's alcoholism makes every effort vain...

Directed by: Yannick Bellon (France, 1972)

Cast: Loleh Bellon, Roland Dubillard, Christine Tsingos

Genre: Drama

programme.title: La course folle
programme.desc: More problems As Maxime suffers mechanical problems and has to return to harbour, Agathe is busy with the tourist side of the business. Vicky is one of the very few women on the archipelago to own a fishing boat. Meanwhile, Dominic prepares to confront the season's most violent storm. Directed by: Jean-François Fontaine (Canada, 2019)

programme.title: L'art a du chien, et du chat...
programme.desc:
Dogs and cats feature prominently in most museums and art galleries. But why do artists feel so inspired by them? What do these artworks reveal about the link that connects these domestic animals and mankind?

Directed by: Anka Schmid (Switzerland, 2021)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 318 Adèle et Victor sont forcés d'oublier un instant leur différends. De son côté, Alice décide de fermer les yeux sur un pan de sa vie. Réalisation : Pascal Roy, Émilie Barbault, Sarah Barbault, Virginie Verrier (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Lou Bonetti (Adèle), Aurore Delplace (Johanna), Fred Bianconi (Virgile), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Bertrand Farge (Victor), Fabrice Deville (Florent), Stéphane Monpetit (Eliott), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Julie Boulanger (Elsa), Marthe Fieschi (Léa), Teilo Azaïs (Enzo) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
